column4: yesterday I started a dist-upgrade from within screen, today I came back and now I cant reattach my screen session because it says screen is not installed . . . is there any way to recover from this?
Unable to lock the administration directory, blah blah blah
this is funning on a virtual server
is the screen still running according to ps aux?
maybe you could download the screen package manually, extract it and start the binary
i tried downloading the source and compiling it but it complains about a dependancy
forget about the source, just download the binary
download that using wget or something, into a directory of its own, then type "ar x *.deb" to extract it
yeah I should be able to go from here with the .deb
module000 : thanks guys I'm back in
